directions: Arrange potatoes in bottom of heavy large saucepan; sprinkle with 1 tablespoon parsley. Top with onions; sprinkle with 1 tablespoon parsley. Top with sausage and bacon. Pour broth over. Season with pepper. Bring to boil over high heat. Cover pan. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer until potatoes are tender and sausage is cooked through, about 40 minutes.
Uncover pan. Boil until liquids are slightly reduced, about 5 minutes. Sprinkle with 2 tablespoons parsley.
ingredients: 3 to 3 1/4 pounds russet potatoes, peeled, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 pound breakfast sausage links, cut into 1-inch pieces
title: Potatoes and Sausage with Parsley
